name: Ice vs Ice bugfix
description:
This is a fast 24h fix for my Epic Megajam 2020 entry. (https://a57r4l.itch.io/ice-vs-ice)

It has awful last minute blueprint bug that makes it necessary to start the game over all again when playing in multiplayer mode.

Gameplay Instructions:

Ride as fast as you can over the iceblocks to reach the goal. Shoot away the blocks but avoid hitting the water. When racing with a friend, it can be hard to take a hit but it can be a lethal one. Good luck and enjoy!

Controls;

Mouse/Keyboard/Gamepad

Keyboard controls AWSD+Shift
